column2: Spouse empowerment laws cannot be changed if the succession law is agnatic or enatic. The laws will depend on the level of council empowerment (with Conclave) OR Legalism & Tolerance.
Spouse empowerment laws will depend on the level of council empowerment (with Conclave) OR Legalism and Tolerance (without Conclave).
Spouse empowerment laws cannot be changed if the succession law is agnatic or enatic.
Spouse empowerment laws can be changed regardless of council empowerment, technology or succession law.
The empowered spouse is considered a voter on the council.
The empowered spouse is NOT considered a voter on the council.
